on reading compounds: 住居【ジュウキョ】dwelling, house, residence, address
先住【センジュウ】original inhabitant, aboriginal, previous priest
安住【アンジュウ】living in peace, being content with one's present position
kun reading compounds: 住む【すむ】to live (of humans), to reside, to inhabit, to dwell, to abide
住まう【すまう】to live, to reside, to inhabit
